case.desc: L/A-3-1: a line touching the closing point of a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.oBdy.CP}]
L/A-3-2: the start and end points of a LineString touching the boundary (at non-vertices) of a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.oBdy.NV}, dim(0){A.L.Bdy.EP = B.oBdy.NV}]
L/A-3-3: the end point of a line touching the closing point of a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Bdy.EP = B.oBdy.CP}]
L/A-3-4: an entire LineString touching the boundary (at non-vertices) of a polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.oBdy.NV-NV}]
L/A-3-5: the start portion of a LineString touching the boundary (at non-vertices) of a polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-V = B.oBdy.NV-NV}]
L/A-3-6: the start portion and the end point of a LineString touching the boundary of a polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-V = B.oBdy.NV-NV}, dim(0){A.L.Bdy.EP = B.A.oBdy.V}]
L/A-3-7: the middle portion of a LineString touching the boundary (at non-vertices) of a polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.V-V = B.oBdy.NV-NV}]
L/A-4-1: a line at non-vertex crossing non-vertex boundary of polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.oBdy.NV}, dim(1){A.L.Int.NV-EP = B.A.Int}]
L/A-4-2: a line at non-vertex crossing non-vertex boundaries of polygon twice [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.oBdy.NV}, dim(1){A.L.Int.NV-NV = B.A.Int}]
L/A-4-3: a line at non-vertex crossing vertex boundary of polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.oBdy.V}, dim(1){A.L.Int.NV-EP = B.A.Int}]
L/A-4-4: a line at non-vertex crossing vertex boundaries of polygon twice [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.oBdy.V}, dim(1){A.L.Int.NV-NV = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.oBdy.CP}]
L/A-4-5: a line at vertex crossing non-vertex boundary of polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.oBdy.NV}, dim(1){A.L.Int.V-EP = B.A.Int}]
L/A-4-6: a line at vertex crossing non-vertex boundaries of polygon twice [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.oBdy.NV}, dim(1){A.L.Int.V-V = B.A.Int}]
L/A-4-7: a line at vertex crossing vertex boundary of polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.oBdy.V}, dim(1){A.L.Int.V-EP = B.A.Int}]
L/A-5-1: an entire line within a polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}]
L/A-5-2: a line within a polygon but the line's both ends touching the boundary of the polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.oBdy.NV}, dim(0){A.L.Bdy.EP = B.oBdy.NV}]
L/A-5-3: a line within a polygon but the line's start point touching the boundary of the polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.oBdy.NV}]

L/A-5-4: a line within a polygon but the line's start point and middle portion touching the boundary of the polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-V = B.A.Int}, dim(1){A.L.Int.V-V = B.oBdy.NV-NV}, dim(1){A.L.Int.V-EP = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.A.oBdy.NV}]

L/A-5-5: a line within a polygon but the line's middle portion touching the boundary of the polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-V = B.A.Int}, dim(1){A.L.Int.V-V = B.A.oBdy.NV-NV}, dim(1){A.L.Int.V-EP = B.A.Int}]
L/Ah-2-1: a line outside a polygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Ext}]
L/Ah-2-2: a line inside a polygon's hole [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Ext.h}]
L/Ah-3-1: the start point of a line touching the inner boundary of a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.A.iBdy.CP}, dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Ext.h}]
L/Ah-3-2: both ends of a line touching the inner boundary of a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.A.iBdy.CP}, dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Ext.h}, dim(0){A.L.Bdy.SP = B.A.iBdy.CP}]
L/Ah-3-1: both ends of a line touching the inner boundary of a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/Ah-3-2: a line at a non-vertex crossing the boundary of a polygon where the closing point of the hole touches the shell at a non-vertex [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/Ah-3-3: a line at a non-vertex crossing the boundary of a polygon where the hole at a vertex touches the shell at a non-vertex [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/Ah-3-4: a line at a non-vertex crossing the boundary of a polygon where the hole at a vertex touches the shell at a vertex [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/Ah-3-5: a line crossing polygon boundary where the closing point of the hole touches the shell at a vertex [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/Ah-3-6: a line at a vertex crossing the boundary of a polygon where closing point of the hole touches the shell at a non-vertex [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/Ah-3-7: a line at a vertex crossing the boundary of a polygon where the hole at a vertex touches the shell at a non-vertex [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/Ah-3-8: a line at a non-vertex crossing the boundary of a polygon where the hole at a vertex touches the shell at a vertex [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.Bdy.TP}]
L/A2h-3-1: the start point a line touching the closing points of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.SP = B.A.iBdy.TP}]
L/A2h-3-2: the interior (at a non-vertex) of a line touching the closing points of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.iBdy.TP}]
L/A2h-3-3: the interior (at a non-vertex) of a line touching the closing point and at a vertex of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.iBdy1.TP}]
L/A2h-3-4: the interior (at a non-vertex) of a line touching the closing point and at a non-vertex of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.iBdy.TP}]
L/A2h-3-5: the start point a line touching the closing point and a non-vertex of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.iBdy.TP}]
L/A2h-3-6: the interior (at a vertex) of a line touching the closing points of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.iBdy.TP}]
L/A2h-3-7: the interior (at a vertex) of a line touching the closing point and at a vertex of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.iBdy1.TP}]
L/A2h-3-8: the interior (at a vertex) of a line touching the closing point and at a non-vertex of two connected holes in a polygon [dim(0){A.L.Int.V = B.A.iBdy.TP}]
L/mA-4-1: a line intersecting the interior and exterior of MultiPolygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-NV = B.2A1.Int}, dim (1){A.L.Int.NV-EP = B.2A2.Int}]
L/mA-4-2: a line intersecting the interior and exterior of MultiPolygon [dim(1){A.L.Int.SP-V = B.2A1.Int}, dim (1){A.L.Int.V-EP = B.2A2.Int}]
L/mA-5-1: a line within two connected polygons [dim(1){A.L.Int = B.2A.Int}, dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.2A.Bdy.TP]
RL/A-3-1: a LinearRing touching a polygon's closing point [dim(0){A.RL.Int.CP = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
RL/A-3-2: a LinearRing touching a polygon's boundary at a non-vertex [dim(0){A.RL.Int.CP = B.A.Bdy.NV}]
RL/A-3-3: a LinearRing touching a polygon's boundary at a non-vertex [dim(0){A.RL.Int.CP = B.A.iBdy.NV}]
RL/A-3-4: a LinearRing on the boundary of a polygon [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Bdy.SP-EP}]
RL/A-3-5: a LinearRing on the inner boundary of a polygon [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.iBdy.SP-EP}]
RL/A-3-6: a LinearRing on the inner boundary of a polygon [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-V = B.A.oBdy.SP-NV}]
RL/A-3-7: a LinearRing on the inner boundary of a polygon [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-V = B.A.iBdy.SP-NV}]
RL/A-4-1: a LinearRing crossing a polygon [dim(1){A.RL.Int.CP-NV = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.L.Int.NV = B.A.Bdy.NV}]

RL/A-4-2: a LinearRing crossing a polygon with a hole [dim(1){A.RL.Int.NV-NV = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.RL.Int.NV = B.A.oBdy.CP}, dim(0){A.RL.Int.NV = B.A.iBdy.CP}, dim(0){A.RL.Int.NV = B.A.oBdy.NV}, dim(0){A.RL.Int.NV = B.A.iBdy.NV}]
RL/A-5-1: a LinearRing within a polygon [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}]
RL/A-5-2: a LinearRing within a polygon with a hole [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}]
RL/A-5-3: a LinearRing within a polygon with a hole [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.L.Int.CP = B.A.oBdy.CP}]
RL/A-5-4: a LinearRing within a polygon with a hole [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.RL.Int.CP = B.A.iBdy.CP}]
RL/A-5-5: a LinearRing within a polygon with a hole [dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}, dim(1){A.RL.Int.SP-NV = B.A.Bdy.iBdy.SP-V}]
nsL/A-3-1: a non-simple LineString touching a polygon [dim(0){A.nsL.Bdy.SP = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
nsL/A-3-2: a non-simple LineString touching a polygon [dim(0){A.nsL.Bdy.SPb = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
nsL/A-3-3: a non-simple LineString touching a polygon [dim(0){A.nsL.Bdy.SPo = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
nsL/A-3-4: a non-simple LineString touching a polygon [dim(0){A.nsL.Bdy.SPx = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
nsL/A-3-5: a non-simple LineString touching a polygon [dim(1){A.nsL.Int.SPb-Vo = B.A.Bdy.SP-NV}]
nsL/A-4-1: a non-simple LineString crossing a polygon [dim(1){A.nsL.Int.V-V-NV = B.A.Int}, dim(1){A.nsL.SPx-V = B.A.Bdy.SP-NV}]
nsL/A-5-1: a non-simple LineString within a polygon [dim(1){A.nsL.Int.SPx-EP = B.A.Int}]
nsL/A-5-2: a non-simple LineString within a polygon [dim(1){A.nsL.Int.SPx-EP = B.A.Int}, dim(1){A.nsL.Int.SPx-V = B.A.Bdy.SP-NV}]
nsL/Ah: the self-crossing point of a non-simple LineString touching the closing point of the inner boundary of a polygon [dim(0){A.nsL.Int.V = B.A.iBdy.CP}]
mL/A-3-1: MultiLineString touching a polygon's closing point [dim(0){A.mL.Bdy.SPb = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
mL/A-3-2: MultiLineString touching a polygon's closing point [dim(0){A.mL.Bdy.SPo = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
mL/A-3-3: MultiLineString touching a polygon's closing point [dim(0){A.mL.Bdy.SPx = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
mL/A-4-1: MultiLineString crossing a polygon [dim(1){A.mL.Int.SP-NVb = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.mL.Int.NVb = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
mL/A-4-2: MultiLineString crossing a polygon [dim(1){A.mL.Int.SP-NVo = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.mL.Int.NVo = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
mL/A-4-3: MultiLineString crossing a polygon [dim(1){A.mL.Int.SP-NVx = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.mL.Int.NVx = B.A.Bdy.CP}]
mL/A-4-4: MultiLineString crossing a polygon [dim(1){A.mL.Int.Vb-Vb = B.A.Int}, dim(0){A.mL.Int.Vb = B.A.oBdy.CP}, dim(0){A.mL.Int.Vb = B.A.iBdy.CP}]

mL/A-5-2: MultiLineString within a polygon [dim(1){A.mL.Int.SP-EP = B.A.Int}]
